comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Several Bain/LOC photos of New York City Mayor John Purroy Mitchel and U. S.  President Woodrow Wilson at the Vera Cruz victims' funeral were posted to Flickr two months ago:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5516953149/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5517542032/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: New York Times story (5/11/14) about the National Memorial Service for the 17 U. S. Sailors killed at Vera Cruz: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=940CE3DB173AE6...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan, 

Thanks for your efforts with the numerous photographs which document the National Memorial Service of May 11, 1914. We will be able to better link the related images and expand the descriptions, including the addition of a date where one is not yet included.  We will add Mr. Tumulty to this description as well, thanks to your note on the image itself.
